title: Phase 3: Polish & Effects - cursor zoom, keyboard display, backgrounds, project format

comments.author: huynhgiabuu
comments.text: Created PRD with 12 tasks: Effects foundation, cursor tracking, zoom, keyboard capture/badges, backgrounds, project format, settings UI, pipeline integration, save/load, performance, docs

title: Phase 2: Core Recording Implementation
description: Implement ScreenCaptureKit integration, audio capture, timeline UI, and MP4 export for Frame screen recorder
close_reason: Phase 2 complete: All 10 subtasks closed - ScreenCaptureKit, audio capture, encoding, UI, timeline, export, auto-save, error handling, testing, and docs

title: ScreenCaptureKit Integration
description: Implement native macOS screen capture using ScreenCaptureKit API
close_reason: Implemented ScreenCaptureKit integration: MacOSScreenCapture struct with display/window listing, SCStream-based capture with BGRA pixel format, frame/audio buffer channels, async start/stop/next_frame/next_audio_buffer. Builds successfully.

title: Documentation
description: Create API documentation and setup guide
close_reason: Comprehensive documentation created including user guide, API reference, troubleshooting, and development setup. All changes committed.

title: Audio Capture Implementation
description: Implement microphone and system audio capture using CoreAudio
close_reason: Implemented audio capture module: MicrophoneCapture using cpal with device listing, stream configuration; AudioMixer for combining sources; SampleRateConverter using rubato. Integrates with ScreenCaptureKit system audio. Builds successfully.

title: Video Encoding with ffmpeg
description: Implement MP4 encoding using ffmpeg-next crate
close_reason: Replaced ffmpeg-next with ffmpeg-sidecar. Auto-downloads ffmpeg binary on first use. H264 VideoToolbox HW encoding verified: 128 fps @ 1080p.

title: Recording Controls UI
description: Update UI for recording start/stop with permission handling
close_reason: Recording Controls UI implemented with permission handling, recording service integration, and full state management. App compiles successfully.

title: Timeline UI Component
description: Create timeline view for reviewing recordings
close_reason: Timeline UI Component implemented with canvas-based rendering, playhead/scrubber, clip visualization, and preview state integration. All changes committed.

title: Export Dialog and Progress
description: Implement export functionality with progress indication
close_reason: Export Dialog and Progress implemented with format/quality/resolution/FPS configuration, progress tracking, and full integration with app state. All changes committed.

title: Project Auto-Save
description: Implement auto-save during recording to prevent data loss
close_reason: Successfully implemented project auto-save and recovery functionality. All changes committed to main branch.

title: Error Handling and Edge Cases
description: Implement comprehensive error handling for all failure modes
close_reason: Successfully implemented comprehensive error handling system with 18 error variants, severity levels, recovery actions, and ErrorDialog UI component. All changes committed.

title: Integration Testing
description: Create integration tests for end-to-end recording flow
close_reason: Integration tests created covering project lifecycle, error handling, UI components, and export workflows. Tests compile successfully.
